Select: Select Id, DataType, RuleType, RuleParameters, RuleKey, RuleName, RuleFunction, DataAttribute, RuleFilter, FailRule, PredictionOrder, KeyNumber, Active, RuleDescription, CreatedBy, ModifiedBy, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate from pdo_qc_rules
Select Id, FunctionName, FunctionUrl, FunctionKey, FunctionType from pdo_rule_functions
Select IndexId, IndexNode.ToString() AS TextIndexNode, IndexLevel, DataName, DataType, DataKey, QC_String, UniqKey, JsonDataObject, Latitude, Longitude from pdo_qc_index
